titleStmt.title: Hopes incovragement pointed at in a sermon, preached in St. Margarets Westminster, before the honorable House of Commons, assembled in Parliament: at the last solemn fast, February 28. 1643. by Tho. Young. Published by order of the House of Commons.
titleStmt.author: Young, Thomas, 1587-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Ralph Smith, at the sign of the Bible in Cornhill, neere the Royall Exchange.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 4 in the imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1643; "March 8, 1643".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible in Cornhill, neere the Royall Exchange.
